definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: sign-post, monument (NH id. ([[חִיֵּין]] Pi. denom.); prob. from √ in orig. physical sense, v. esp. Ar. s.uw=ah;un Syr. s.aw=a0nun, cf. Schulth:Hom. Wurz. 57 Kö:ii 1:154; > √[[חין]] Buhl.);—abs. ´[[ח]], grave-stone 2Ki 23:17; sign-post Ez Eze 39:15; guide-posts, pl. [[חִיֻּנִים]] Je 31:21 (‖[[תַּמְרוּרִים]]).
